RESOLVED_ENTITIES.this Court: United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the legal case is being tried, with a tradition of not favoring interrogations of jurors except in cases of illegal or prejudicial intrusion into the jury process
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: federal court reviewing the case and providing jury instructions on the importance of reaching a verdict, emphasizing individual conscientious conviction in deliberations, with prior decisions upholding the use of the modified Allen charge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court where the trial of Maria De Jesus Garcia took place, the jury deliberated, and post-verdict discovery was denied, also made oral findings of fact regarding the constitutionality of the stop and search
